fields.qualifications: Permission granted to black out the noncompliance information on the label. The label must appear on the container as it is shown on this application with the text blacked out in the manner you have chosen. (allowing the use-up without blacking out oaked. no other use-ups will be granted) NO MORE USE-UPS WILL BE GRANTED. This certificate is operative for the release of not more than the following number of bottle cases/ kegs. (160 cases) This use-up authorizes the depletion of product and labels that are currently in existence as of the date the use-up was requested. No additional product may be made and no additional labels may be printed. TTB has not reviewed this label for type size, characters per inch or contrasting background. The responsible industry member must continue to ensure that the mandatory information on the actual labels is displayed in the correct type size, number of characters per inch, and on a contrasting background in accordance with the TTB labeling regulations, 27 CFR parts 4, 5, 7, and 16, as applicable.
